title: Review: ‘Kimberly Akimbo,’ Both Great and Small, Seizes the Day
description: The season’s most moving new musical earns its place among the behemoths of Broadway.
dc:creator: Jesse Green
media:description: Victoria Clark, left, as Kimberly and Justin Cooley as Seth in David Lindsay-Abaire and Jeanine Tesori’s musical “Kimberly Akimbo” at the Booth Theater in Manhattan.
